title: HTTP Server Guide
description: A comprehensive guide to setting up and using the HTTP server.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: This guide provides an overview of how to set up and use the HTTP server in Dino@rmy.

sections.title: Installation
sections.content: To install the HTTP server, follow these steps: ...

sections.title: Configuration
sections.content: Configure the server by editing the configuration file located at /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf.

sections.title: Usage
sections.content: To start the server, use the command: `httpd start`.
